title: Leading Croatian national team players at FIFA World Cup 2018 , by market value
summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The Market value in million euros of Month Ivan Rakitic is 33.33% larger than the minimum value at Dominik Livakovic.
min_summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Market value in million euros 50.0 is found at Month Ivan Rakitic and the minimum is found at Dominik Livakovic where Month is 1.5.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The Market value in million euros of Month Ivan Rakitic is 33.33% larger than the minimum value at Dominik Livakovic.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
The second highest Market value in million euros is appeared to be the Month Ivan Perisic.
The difference of Market value in million euros between the highest and lowest Month is 48.5.
The Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros, followed by Ivan Perisic, and Mateo Kovacic. Down to the Month Dominik Livakovic which is the lowest.
The Market value in million euros has decreased over the past 23 Months.
Month Andrej Kramaric, and Marcelo Brozovic share the same value 27.0.
The Month Ivan Rakitic has 3.16 times more Market value in million euros than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 364.0.
